check.name: MetadataModifiedDatePresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Metadata Modified Date concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept MetadataModifiedDate is present."
if(MetadataModifiedDate is not None and len(MetadataModifiedDate) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "MetadataModifiedDate concept is not present"
return False
